title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: A California judge rules that Trump's deployment of the guard to LA was illegal

items.title: Dozens of scientists find errors in a new Energy Department climate report
items.description: More than 85 scientists say that a recent U.S. Department of Energy report is full of errors and misrepresents climate science.

items.title: Kraft Heinz is splitting up, separating hot dogs from ketchup
items.description: One of the world's largest food brands is splitting apart a decade after a messy megamerger staged by Warren Buffett.

items.title: Firing squad execution of prisoner with dementia blocked by Utah court
items.description: The Utah Supreme Court blocked a death row inmate's upcoming execution, after the inmate's attorneys argued his dementia has significantly worsened.

items.title: Gold price hits record high as investors seek safety
items.description: Experts say uncertainty resulting from US policy is making investors seek safer investments such as gold.

items.title: Maps show how Texas, California redistricting could affect congressional seats
items.description: See maps of how Texas and California's push could play out, based on the 2024 election results.

items.title: Drones blasting rock music help scare wolves away from cattle
items.description: Biologists are using drones to blast AC/DC's "Thunderstruck" and movie clips at the apex predators to shoo them away from cattle.

items.title: North Korea's Kim arrives in Beijing with daughter and possible heir
items.description: The North Korean leader is due to attend a military parade and attend his first multilateral meeting.

items.title: Gérard Depardieu to face trial over rape and sexual assault allegations
items.description: His accuser, Charlotte Arnould, says she is relieved the case is going to court, seven years after she filed a complaint.

items.title: Putin and Kim join China's Xi for powerful show of anti-U.S. force
items.description: China's Xi Jinping has invited Vladimir Putin and North Korea's Kim Jong Un for a display of power, and the rising tide of anti-Western sentiment.

items.title: Chloe Malle to become top editor at American Vogue
items.description: The 39-year-old's appointment marks a new era for one of the most influential and glamorous fashion publications.

items.description: A federal judge rules the government broke a law limiting domestic use of the military.

items.title: What to know about Guatemalan migrant children and efforts to send them home
